title: What Really Happened in Apt. 4C?
description:
It was Saturday night, and Joey Communale headed to an after party at the home of James Rackover, son of multimillionaire jewelry to the stars Jeffrey Rackover. But Joey would never leave the apartment alive. Then detectives discover that James Rackover is not who he appears to be, and try to unravel the mystery: Is James Jeffrey’s surrogate son, or his lover? Where is Joey’s body? And what really happened in Apartment 4C?

Source materials for this episode cannot be listed here due to character limitations. For a full list of sources, please visit https://redcollarpodcast.com/
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
